description.value:
Edara and Calia made this choker out of metallic leaves and bloodglass for Litsa, carefully imbuing it with magical energy and love. It glows brightly with their shared sigil. While Litsa wears the choker of the eternal bond, the choker bolsters her connection to Eda, allowing her to move up to 150 feet from her before unmanifesting instead of 100 feet. The eidolon can also Activate the collar to move even further.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Litsa focuses her will on the choker, allowing the choker to maintain the connection between you at any distance. For the next 5 minutes, you and your eidolon can move any distance from each other without your eidolon unmanifesting. When the duration ends, if your eidolon is more than 150 feet from you, they immediately unmanifest.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
